MSDN Developer Conference

November 2008 · wordpress, republished, wayback, uncategorized

Originally published on WordPress on November 18, 2008. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on just3ws.wordpress.com. Republished from local Wayback snapshot exports.

Chicago will be hosting a MDC event on January 13th at the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Downtown Chicago.

I’ve got my ticket. It’s too bad that it’s only a one day event, I’d like to attend all the sessions but will probably stick to the “Tools, Languages and Framework” track.

http://www.msdndevcon.com/Pages/start.aspx
